title: Not able to make a ticket
body: So I've made about 3 posts already about this same reconnect issue, and all I've gotten is basically "make a ticket" so I tried to and this is what I get http://i64.tinypic.com/2wqgzev.jpg

replies.body:
You should be able to click **"Submit a Request"** at the top of that page which will take you to the ticket page. If you're not seeing the top bar that looks like the image below, try [**clearing your browser history and cookies**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752694-Clearing-Browser-History-and-Cookies) or using a private/incognito browser window.

https://i.gyazo.com/b8702f47968abf9d7755fda135be7e08.png
